math

Class Vec

  • java.lang.Object
    • math.Vec

  • public class Vec
extends java.lang.Object
    3D vector class that contains three doubles. Could be used to represent Vectors but also Points and Colors.

    • Field Summary

        public Vec reflect(Vec normal)
        Calculates the reflection of the vector in relation to a given surface normal. The vector points at the surface and the result points away.
